content.label: This game is so freaking fun, the only things it needs are more players, adding more factions would be epic, and a way to play against bots or do matchmaking with short turn limits, so a game could be played at a faster pace. Would give 5 stars if it had these features, awesome game!
This is one of my favorite games on the App Store

Have the SERVERS been cut off? The game will not start now.
Please let me know if the developers will be fixing this.

title.label: My Favorite Game, but hoping they add AI

content.label:
This is definitely my favorite iOS game.  Excellent strategy game that is a blast to play for me and my kids.

It would be even better if they added AI computer players so I could play a faster game without having to wait for other humans to play their turn. A few different computer player profiles with different tactics and ability levels would be nice.

This game is a hugely underrated gem. Everything about this game is fantastic! It’s a great strategy game, cute characters, well balanced gameplay, good game length, and NO pay to win mechanics. It’s sad to see that it has fallen by the wayside. This game could be so much more with additional maps and Characters. There are some really creative fan-made character concepts on the internet. I really wish that someone would revive this game.

This is a fun and strategic game. It is a shame that it is not being updated anymore.
The seasons doesn’t end and you’re stuck in the league that you started.
While I enjoyed it for a few days, it’s just frustrating knowing that you will never progress in the game.
This used to be a great game.  Wish you could play against the computer.  Multiplayer servers don't work. Pass n play still works.

title.label: Love this game... but needs new content.

content.label: I have been playing this game for years.  It is a lot of fun.  The only thing stopping me from giving it 5 stars is it needs some new content added to keep the game fresh and exciting.
I’ve been playing for years and won’t stop anytime soon

title.label: Best game in the App Store

content.label:
Best game in the App Store 
Great balance of pairing against other opponents

title.label: Best Balance Strategy Game on iOS

content.label: Looking for a balance non-microtransaction game? This is it. Beautifully artwork, everything is symmetrical. This game is full of meta, strats to outplay your opponent, using fog of war or baiting. It's like chess with a little RPG element (hp, damage, range). Multiple maps for multiple build order. Easy to play, hard to master. Support these guys if you like it.
Greatest game ever, but can you please add another team? it’s been years since you guys added the veggienauts.
I think the devs might have cut off the servers, I cannot access

title.label: The best pass and play game

content.label: I have been playing this game with my older brother for years and we never get bored with it. Although, it would be better if there were more updates, but all in all it a great game.
I absolutely loved this game, but hope sometime soon the creators or some one add another tribe...? Class? Species? Another playable category of monsters, I guess.
But last update, now unable to connect

A true hidden gem with a great dedicated community of players. Plays like a 3D chess, there are many strategies with different play styles to go along.

Edit: It’s been a while but this still remains a cheap and no intrusive classic that belongs on everyone’s phone and desktop. I would go as far to say that this should be made an Olympic sport. Make Outwitters, not War.
Fixed! Thanks!!
This game is great me and my little brother love this game. It was so good that I could scream.
It back because I think I deleted it like 1 year ago
As much this is the best App Store game, I hate having to wait so long for someone else to play their turn. We should be able to sync online games and play without waiting for hrs.
I’ve been playing this game for many many years now. It’s been my favorite from day one. I sometimes refer to my iPhone as my Outwitters device.

Love the game, but it's completely broken. It crashes constantly and the developers don't care. They took the money and have moved on to their next hustle. They don't see the value in the community they helped create. Why would I want to buy hex gambit or other games they made if they allow Outwitters to be this ruined. It literally crashes multiple times per turn.

The game limits you to 3 matches at a time. You are notified that you can buy anything from their store to increase the match limit to 20. So I spent $3.99 to unlock a character, but still can't play past 3 matches, even though it shows the character unlocked in the game. Waited 10 minutes and still nothing. So basically I spent $4 and literally can't play the game.

This game is literally my life. I love it so much. I have climbed the ranks, and my dad is not a SUPER TITAN! That's the best it gets. We've bought the packs of different characters, and it was so worth it. No doubt. This is the best game ever. I play 2v2 and 1v1. I play friendly games with my dad, and pas and plays with my brothers. The league plays are awesome too!  I recommend this, soooo much. It's so amazing. Get this game and support the amazing people who invented it. Best and most fun game I've ever played. Download it!! You shouldn't regret it.
One of my favs! There's some glitch that keeps causing the app to close, if that was fixed, I'd give it 5
Instead of spending all you time building Hex Gambit, how about all the recent fixing all the game play issues.
Great game, very unstable. Game crashes on startup and during my turn.
I accidentally deleted game center can you make your game able to not have to use game center

This is the best game I've ever played hands down. The only down side is I feel like the game is at the tail end of its lifespan.   

If one man left takes over the outwitters sports network I can see this game lasting a lot longer but I'm worried they might not take it over. I really really hope they do. This game is brilliant and deserves to last as long as possible.

Edit: 1 year later the game is still going. Oml took over outwitters sports network luckily! I thought outwitters would die off when hex gambit was released but turns out they won't have hex gambit on mobile so I'll be sticking with outwitters and hope others do too.
It needs a new team.
Having a good time moving up the ranks. I enjoy the ability to play and then set it down. You don't have to babysit it. It's worth paying the little bit to unlock other characters.

title.label: One of the Best, Must Have

content.label: This is one of my favorite games I've come across, including classic board games.  Has the fun of a board game, take it with you, play with friends or competitively.  I bought the add-on content and have not regretted it at all.  Only down side is matches can take a while, when the opponent isn't your friend your passing your device to.  This game deserves a try from everyone.
This is an awesome strategy game. 🎮⚔️🛡🗡

title.label: Best game in the app store!

content.label: Balanced, well thought out, and fun!
I had this game for so long and for like a month they teased new classes then stoped and we got nothing for a year. Please give us something.
Super addicting. Great strategy game.
Perfect
Awesome game but crashes a lot please fix

If you like chess, and you like to think, you will love it. I think the reason it's not more popular is because you play against other people comparable in skills, so each person wins half the time and loses half the time. Most people who play video games want to feel like they are winning most of the time.

title.label: Do you want to rate this?

content.label:
Every tome I load the app, it asks if I want to rate it. No matter what I click on, nothing happens. It's a bug. I am writing a review to see if it's a GameCenter issue. 

The game is good but since it's turn-based you have to wait for people to move. If that's a day, then it's hard to remember details of that game. Hard to get in a rhythm. AI would be good for practicing.

OK look at first I had trouble playing the game because of the update but now it's working fine it's easily the best game on the Internet give it a try hopefully it works it's so crazy you never believe it a lot of strategy play real opponents it's got a good fan base it doesn't get is just desserts for sure so just give me a shout man you don't like it I'll tell you what if you don't like

title.label: Great only if it is working

content.label: Besides many previous problems this game has had, now it demands a pop up window to rate the game EVERY TIME you open the game. It doesn't matter which selection you pick; you just have to pick one to move on to your game list. I can honestly say I get a lot of game play from this game but have NEVER had such persistent PROBLEMS with any single game EVER. It's. tough trade off, especially when you have PAID for a game.

This is my favorite iOS game, hands down. It's an engaging turn-based strategy game that's like chess, but better. Their support is amazing as well, they are very responsive and caring towards their gamers! :)

This game is fantastic - seems simple at first - but with time turns into a chess-like game of strategy. Nice ranking system that rewards gamers for good performances. Although I can never get promoted beyond the gifted league
App doesn't work after update.
A frustratingly wonderful modern take on chess.
My all time favorite game. It's like chess and battleship with resource (wits) management. Best strategy mobile pvp game.
The best turn based strategy game
Ok....dick move.   Get me addicted to a game, take my money, then make it to where it doesn't work.... can I have my money back...... or ....... at least fix it ...... that'd be awesome 😕
